response.overview: Before the marriage, Tang Shi Min treats Zhang Jing Fen with care and attention, but after the marriage, Min is pleased with the business, but leaves his wife alone. After the marriage, Min is very pleased with his wife, but she is not happy with her. Fen's tactics of 'three obedience and four virtues' and 'crying and hanging' are unable to make Min change his mind.
response.title: The Way of a Husband and Wife
